resources.string: To prepare your device, please install the ARCore Service.

Support Devices: 
• Google Pixel and Pixel XL 
• Samsung Galaxy S8 (SM-G950U, SM-G950N, SM-G950F, SM-G950FD, SM-G950W, SM-G950U1) 
https://developers.google.com/ar/discover/
I have downloaded and installed ARCore Preview2, do not show this alert again.
Camera permission is needed to run this application
This device does not support AR.
Reorder and set this cube to the first.
Move on x and z axis.
